ns:common.topic.description: Abstract State Machine Language is a programming language based on the Abstract State Machines formal method and developed by Microsoft. AsmL is a functional language.\nXASM is an open source implementation of the language.
rdfs:label: Abstract State Machine Language

ns:common.document.text: Abstract State Machine Language (AsmL) is a programming language based on the Abstract State Machines formal method and developed by Microsoft. AsmL is a functional language (which are commonly used in academic research).\nXASM is an open source implementation of the language.

ns:type.object.name: Abstract State Machine Language
